subject: Colleges and Universities
Football
lead_paragraph: The son of the Hall of Famer John Elway is leaving the Arizona State football program, the university confirmed. Jack Elway plans to remain a student at the college. Sun Devils Coach Dennis Erickson told The Arizona Republic on Monday, “He’s just tired of football and wants to do something else with his life.”.
